data: Readestown, U. S. A., is a smart, flourishing little city upon a certain river which runs down to the sea, and it owes its founding and success to a family of wonderful inventors by the name of Reade.
Lost in the Atlantic Valley; Or, Frank Reade, Jr., and His Wonder, the "Dart"
browsing: science-fiction & fantasy|browsing: fiction|category: science-fiction & fantasy|category: adventure|category: novels
